title: Ezekiel clothing number two
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021508im_/http:/typophile.com/files/twhite_ezekiel2_6060.jpg)

I know this is almost certainly custom.

BUT WAIT!!! DON’T LEAVE JUST YET!! I DO HAVE AN ID QUESTION!!

Let’s say I wanted to recreate this font. What font(s) could I use as a BASE to create a custom font like this?

Thank you.
author: dirtcastle

comments.content:
try campanile from dafont.com  
 [http://www.dafont.com/campanile.font?nb\_ppp=50&psize=l&text=EZEKIEL](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021508/http:/www.dafont.com/campanile.font?nb_ppp=50&psize=l&text=EZEKIEL "http://www.dafont.com/campanile.font?nb\_ppp=50&psize=l&text=EZEKIEL")

the L and E are /similar/ enough at least to get some inspiration.

In the spirit of unbridled creativity,

Troy Vera  
Kingdom Graphics  
 [http://www.kingdomgraphics.biz](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021508/http:/www.kingdomgraphics.biz/ "http://www.kingdomgraphics.biz")
